title: Green vegetables with mint caper butter
description: A flavourful side dish that is wonderful with a roast.
tips: Serve this straight after cooking otherwise the vegetables will lose their colour.

default: 300g/10½oz fine green beans, trimmed and halved
coarse sea salt and black pepper

steps: Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil and cook the beans and broad beans for 3 minutes. Add the mangetout and cook for a further 2 minutes. Drain and tip into a warm bowl. Add half the mint, season with salt and pepper and toss.
Melt the butter in a saucepan over a high heat. Add the capers, lemon juice, blanched vegetables and remaining mint. Heating briefly and tossing together before serving. Serve piping hot.
